languages.text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.
languages.original_text: За каждую единицу {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели этот громовой молот наносит +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и обладает суммирующимся шансом 10% оглушить этого противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Успешное прохождение проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} позволяет игнорировать эффект. Булавы и молоты позволяют совершать особую атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивающую{/g} противников.

traits.locale_text: За каждую единицу {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели этот громовой молот наносит +3 урона и обладает суммирующимся шансом 10% оглушить этого противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Успешное прохождение проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:Test}сопротивление{/g} позволяет игнорировать эффект. Булавы и молоты позволяют совершать особую атаку, отбрасывающую противников.

За каждую единицу {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели этот громовой молот наносит +3 урона и обладает суммирующимся шансом 10% оглушить этого противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Успешное прохождение проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:Test}сопротивление{/g} позволяет игнорировать эффект. Булавы и молоты позволяют совершать особую атаку, отбрасывающую противников.

languages.text: 这把雷霆锤造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高3点。此外，目标每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，这把武器的攻击都会有10%的几率令目标眩晕1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。 目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，才能抵消眩晕效果。 锤棍与战锤拥有特殊的攻击方式，可以将敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推走{/g}。
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

traits.locale_text: 这把雷霆锤造成的伤害提高3点。此外，目标每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，这把武器的攻击都会有10%的几率令目标眩晕1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。 目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，才能抵消眩晕{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。 锤棍与战锤拥有特殊的攻击方式，可以将敌人推走。

这把雷霆锤造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高3点。此外，目标每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，这把武器的攻击都会有10%的几率令目标眩晕1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。 目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，才能抵消眩晕效果。 锤棍与战锤拥有特殊的攻击方式，可以将敌人推走。

languages.text: サンダーハンマーは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を3与え、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}ポイントそれぞれに敵が気絶状態になるスタック確率を10%上げる。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格すると、この効果を無効化できる。 メイスとハンマーは敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押しのける{/g}特殊攻撃が可能。
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

traits.locale_text: ダメージ+3、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}ポイントそれぞれに敵が気絶状態になるスタック確率+10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格するとこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を無効化できる。 メイスとハンマーは敵を押しのける特殊攻撃が可能。

サンダーハンマーは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を3与え、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}ポイントそれぞれに敵が気絶状態になるスタック確率を10%上げる。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格すると、この効果を無効化できる。 メイスとハンマーは敵を押しのける特殊攻撃が可能。

languages.text: Este martillo de trueno causa +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y otorga una probabilidad acumulable del +10 % de aturdir a un enemigo durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del mismo. Superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} niega este efecto. Las mazas y los martillos tienen un ataque especial que {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a los enemigos.
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

traits.locale_text: Este martillo de trueno causa +3 de daño y otorga una probabilidad acumulable del +10 % de aturdir a un enemigo durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del mismo. Superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} niega este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}. Las mazas y los martillos tienen un ataque especial que empuja a los enemigos.

languages.text: Dieser Energiehammer verursacht +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und gewährt eine stapelbare Chance von +10 %, einen Feind 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang zu betäuben, und zwar für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkungspunkt{/g} des Feindes. Eine erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} hebt diesen Effekt auf. Streitkolben und Hämmer haben einen Spezialangriff, der Feind {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}wegstößt{/g}.
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Energiehammer fügt +3 Schaden zu und gewährt eine +10 %ige Addierungschance, einen Feind für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zu betäuben, und zwar für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektionspunkt{/g} des Feindes. Eine erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} negiert diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}. Streitkolben und Hämmer haben einen Spezialangriff, der Feind wegstößt.

languages.text: Ce marteau Thunder inflige +3 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et confère +10 % de chances d'étourdir un ennemi pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} pour chaque point de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi. Un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} réussi annule cet effet. Les masses et les marteaux possèdent une attaque spéciale qui {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} les ennemis.
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

traits.locale_text: Ce marteau Thunder inflige +3 points de dégâts et confère +10 % de chances d'étourdir un ennemi pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} pour chaque point de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi. Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} réussi annule cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}. Les masses et les marteaux possèdent une attaque spéciale qui repousse les ennemis.

languages.text: Bu gürleyen çekiç +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve düşmanın her bir {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} puanı karşılığında o düşmanı +%10 sersemletme olasılığı (üst üste birikebilir) kazandırır. Sersemlik etkisi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} sürer. Başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testi{/g}, bu etkiyi yadsır. Topuz ve çekiçler, düşmanları {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itip{/g} uzaklaştıran özel bir saldırıya sahiptir.
languages.original_text: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.
